docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court will take up the pregnancy discrimination claims of a package delivery driver for UPS who was refused a light duty assignment so she could continue working while pregnant.

headline.main: Justices to Take Up Pregnancy Discrimination Case
headline.print_headline: Justices to Take Up Pregnancy Discrimination Case

docs.snippet: The Supreme Court will take up the pregnancy discrimination claims of a package delivery driver for UPS who was refused a light duty assignment so she could continue working while pregnant.

docs.lead_paragraph: Their Senate majority in peril, anxious Democrats have seized the Supreme Court decision that some companies need not provide birth control to women as fresh evidence of the GOP's "war on women" — an argument they hope will energize female voters who could decide the balance of power on Capitol Hill.

headline.main: Dems Hope Decision Will Energize Female Supporters
headline.print_headline: Dems Hope Decision Will Energize Female Supporters

docs.snippet: Their Senate majority in peril, anxious Democrats have seized the Supreme Court decision that some companies need not provide birth control to women as fresh evidence of the GOP's "war on women" — an argument they hope will energize female...

docs.lead_paragraph: Even as conservatives celebrated coming out on the winning side of a divisive social issue, their court victory may have also handed Democrats an issue that will turn out liberal voters.

headline.seo: Hobby Lobby Decision Highlights Parties’ Divide
headline.main: A Ruling That Both Sides Can Run With
headline.print_headline: A Ruling That Both Sides Can Run With

docs.abstract: News analysis; Supreme Court's ruling that government cannot force certain employers to pay for birth control is one that both conservatives and liberals can run with; even as conservatives celebrate coming out on winning side of divisive social issue, their court victory may have also handed Democrats an issue that will turn out liberal voters in fall mid-term elections.
docs.snippet: Even as conservatives celebrated coming out on the winning side of a divisive social issue, their court victory may have also handed Democrats an issue that will turn out liberal voters.
